<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 179 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Monk](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=232)

**Prerequisites**
[Monk Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6210)

</column>

---

You gain the [Flurry of Blows](/Actions.aspx?ID=2817) action. Your fists’ power, however, exceeds your conditioning; once you use Flurry of Blows, you can’t use it again for 1d4 rounds as your muscles recover.
